Slatey Marven was a commoner from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Slatey was a human woman with a sun-kissed skin tone, big brown eyes, and black hair gathered in tight cornrow braids.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, the half-orcish artist named Splatters Doolug spent his days painting murals on the Old Wall. His art faced criticism from some passersby like Slatey Marven, who thought Doolug took criticism poorly. She believed that artists were too soft and that their egos crumbled with a single negative comment, instead of taking the criticism as feedback to grow and improve.
